Title: Discovery
Plot: Dawson turns to Jen after learning of his mom's affair, and Joey's knowledge of it. But he regrets doing so when she tells him some of her problems; meanwhile Pacey and Tamara continue to tempt fate with their fling.
ParentalRatingReason: PG Violence, coarse language and sexual references
GuestStars: Leann Hunley, Ed Grady, Travis Stanberry, Mitchell Laurance, Ric Reitz, Jeremy D. Shepherd
